sourcesContent:
<template>
  <component :is="`${layout}-layout`" v-if="layout"/>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  setup () {
    const route =  useRoute ()
    const layout = computed(()=> route.meta.layout)

    return {
      layout
    }
 },
 components: {
    MainLayout,
    AuthLayout
 }
}
</script>
